room_title: Escape room "The Genie’s Lamp" by Vault Escape in Chicago
review: Totally new to escape rooms. This was my first one and I had a great time. It wasn't too difficult that we needed a ton of clues but definitely needed a clue or two here and there. Lots of surprises and fun things to interact with. Highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "The Genie’s Lamp" by Vault Escape in Chicago
review: We had 3 adults and 3 kids in our group. Mike greeted us and explained what we had to do. Mike also helped us with clues when we were stuck. Unfortunately we didn't escape. You get 60 minutes, but time flies by. I would come back to try different senerio.

room_title: Escape room "The Genie’s Lamp" by Vault Escape in Chicago
review: Who would have guessed you could have so much fun with brain teezers and math puzzles. It was a great team-building experience, and very challenging. Highly recommend it!
